markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reinforced Wheels](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1362)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 72</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All Pathfinder Society agents also have access to all assistive items from Morhen’s Mobility Apparel_

**Price** 5 sp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The chair's wheels have been reinforced with tough, metal rims or a metal cap. While in the chair, you gain a wheel Strike. Your wheel deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage and has the [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [attached](/Traits.aspx?ID=171), and [free-hand](/Traits.aspx?ID=181) traits. A reinforced wheel is a simple melee weapon in the [club](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=5) weapon group. You can etch weapon runes onto reinforced wheels. A wheelchair can only have one attached weapon.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Reinforced Wheels
